==Walkthrough==
# Defeat the enemies.
#* {{Enemy|Ruin Cruiser|x=2}}
# Follow the Mechanical Crab and continue your search.
#* A [[Common Chest]] can be found on the right of the corridor.
# Check on the person injured.
# Collect the documents nearby x3
#* A [[Common Chest]] can be found beside the [[Clusterleaf of Cultivation]].
# Stop the key-line extractor.
# Defeat the enemies. 
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Ruin Destroyer;Ruin Scout}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Ruin Scout;Ruin Cruiser}}
# Return to the lab.
#* A [[Common Chest]] can be found on the right of the corridor.
# Follow the southern tunnel to start a cut scene and dialogue.
#* A [[Precious Chest]] will appear after the cutscene.
# Leave domain.
